text: Shahjalal International Airport is the largest airport in Bangladesh. It is the only international airport in Dhaka, and was previously known as Dacca International Airport. ==Gallery== File:Shahjalal International Airport (05).jpg|Shahjalal International Airport (Terminal-1). File:Shahjalal International Airport (06).jpg|Shahjalal International Airport (Terminal-2). File:Entry BD.gif|An arrival stamp issued by the Immigration Officer of the airport on 8 January 2011. File:ZiaAirport-05.jpg|Interior of the departure zone ==References== ==Other websites== * Civil Aviation Authority, Bangladesh: Airports * Live Flight Tracking Category:Buildings and structures in Dhaka Category:Airports in Asia
title: Shahjalal International Airport
